name: DanceMasters
description: Match your pose with the silhouette! Hit the markers with your hands and feet!Through the power of Kinect you can experience a completely new dance game using your entire body--no controller required.Experience exhilarating dancing and the excitement of an ultra-modern dance club from your own home, either alone or with friends!There is more to the game than dancing. Your image is projected onto the stage in real time!You can also save your performances and use them as backup dancers during the game!You can even take snapshots of your dance poses,and share snapshots with your friends during online dance offs!This next generation dance game supports two-player simultaneous play locally and four-player simultaneous play online!
